divs: Sighting DetailsAmazing sighting lots of witness by the family, we were sat outside due to visiting family then I just looked up. I have an intrest in UFO's then i seen the object and made everyone aware everybody seen it. it was Red solid object pulsating very bright although it was round shape the whole object was red no chance this could be a plane as miles from any airport flight paths it was going way to fast for a plane it went across our sight from right to left. then right in front of our eyes it just disappeared. managed to take a photo and very short video off mini ipad footage is poor but you can still see the object. after it was going by felt giddy little excited. few minutes later helicopter in the very far distance lost sight of it.
Summary: Red flashing solid object then disappeared right in front of us.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Sheffield
There were no other sightings in Sheffield on or around August 30th 2013
